HTTPHeadersService-Worker-Navigation-Pre.summary:
The Service-Worker-Navigation-Preload request header indicates that the request was the result of a operation made during service worker navigation preloading.
It allows a server to respond with a different resource than for a normal fetch().

remarks.para: If a different response may result from setting this header, the server must set Vary: Service-Worker-Navigation-Preload to ensure that the different responses are cached.
